## Additional Resources

For those interested in learning more about ski jumping history and the sport:

- **U.S. National Ski Hall of Fame** - Located in Ishpeming, Michigan
- **Ski Jumping Hill Archive** - [skisprungschanzen.com](https://www.skisprungschanzen.com)
- **USA Nordic** - The national governing body for ski jumping in the United States
- **US Ski Jumping Story Project** - A collection of personal anecdotes and remembrances from ski jumpers
